title: Tonto National Monument: Learn About the Park
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park           Learn About the Park       Revelations and Insights Learn about people of long ago living in the beautiful Sonoran Desert. Artifacts provided insights into people of the past. The words offered by Native people today reveal a deep connection to their ancestors who lived in the Tonto Basin. Reading the historical accounts provides other perspectives. Understanding the Sonoran Desertâ€™s plants, animals, and natural features creates the setting for this compelling story.
